title: WTT: My T205 Miller for your T205/T206 Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Miller for your T205/T206 Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody wanna trade?  Dots may not be pretty to look at, but I don't expect much in return.  Evidently, he got his name when somebody asked Honus Wagner (with his German accent) where John Miller was, and Honus replied "Dots Miller over dere..."

Take Care,
Geno
